document_data.name: Bolo's Tentside Inn
document_data.mainbody: '''Bolo's Tentside Inn''' was an boarding house set up in the makeshift settlement that formed around [[Boareskyr Bridge]] during the latter half of the 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was run by a rather talkative [[halfling]] woman named [[Bolo]].
document_data.Location: The inn was set up in the central pavilion of Boareskyr Bridge's tent-structure settlement.
document_data.History: Some time in the 1480s [[DR]],{{ToD-time}} a senior member of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] named [[Varram]] killed a [[yuan-ti]] spy in the inn, by stabbing it with his ''[[dragontooth dagger]]''.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: It had a reputation as a rather rowdy establishment.
